extraction_note: Copied from extracted_data1 directory - Matter 1.4 cluster data

attributes.name: BorderRouterName
attributes.description: Indicates a user-friendly name identifying the device model or product of the Border Router.

attributes.name: BorderAgentID
attributes.description: Indicates a 16-byte globally unique ID for a Thread Border Router device.

attributes.name: ThreadVersion
attributes.description: Indicates the Thread version supported by the Thread interface configured by the cluster instance.

attributes.name: InterfaceEnabled
attributes.description: Indicates whether the associated IEEE 802.15.4 Thread interface is enabled or disabled.

attributes.name: ActiveDatasetTimestamp
attributes.description: Timestamp value extracted from the Active Dataset value configured by the Thread Node.

attributes.name: PendingDatasetTimestamp
attributes.description: Timestamp value extracted from the Pending Dataset value configured by the Thread Node.

parameters.description: This command is used to request the active operational dataset of the Thread network to which the border router is connected.
This command is used to request the pending dataset of the Thread network to which the border router is connected.
This command is sent in response to GetActiveDatasetRequest or GetPendingDatasetRequest command.
This command is used to set the active Dataset of the Thread network to which the Border Router is connected.
This command is used to set or update the pending Dataset of the Thread network to which the Border Router is connected.
